name: Shambles
text:
[Main] If your leader has the {Supernovas} type, return one of your characters to its owner's hand. Then, put up to one cost 2 or less character of a different color than the returned card from your hand into play.
[Trigger] Activate this card's [Main] ability.

effect.text: If your leader has the {Supernovas} type, return one of your characters to its owner's hand. Then, put up to one cost 2 or less character of a different color than the returned card from your hand into play.
